name: Unknown
shortDescription: Begin without an existing story to your name and shape your own right from the start.
longDescription: The "Unknown" background provides the same experience as starting without any background. You start with the faction you selected without any additional change.

name: Heavy Debt
shortDescription: With a lingering and heavy debt to be paid, you start your journey hoping to one day escape it.
longDescription: Choosing this background puts you in to permanent debt. Every month, depending on your level, a certain amount of credits will be subtracted.
